home.title: Home
home.translation: German translation is still in progress.

amino-counter.title: Amino Counter
amino-counter.description: Count your daily intake of the amino acid mixture (short AM).

apps.title: Apps
apps.phe-rechner: German PKU app that combines calculator, pen, paper and nutrition table (~ 2017).
apps.pku-manager: English PKU app for searching, calculating and tracking food (~ 2018).
apps.simple-nutrition-calculator: General app for calculating any nutrient values (~ 2019).

about.title: About
about.install: You can install this app on any device by adding it to the home screen.
about.author: Author
about.sources: Sources: Common food from the USDA National Nutrient Database
